p.value: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

abstract.value: The Sabbateni collection contains printed and manuscript music in 13 parts bound into 31 volumes, for the use of a four-part chorus in Prague, circa 1603-1604.

unittitle.value: The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts

Published citations should take the following form:

Identification of item, date (if known); Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Manuscripts; MSS 239; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
The Sabbateni collection contains printed and manuscript music parts bound into 31 volumes, for the use of a four-part chorus in Prague, circa 1603-1604.

Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
